abstract.shortdesc: This is an abstract base DITA-OT Plug-in to extend HTML processing and allow additional plug-ins to add an extra CSS stylesheet to the header of each HTML page. By default the plug-in does nothing apart from creating a temporary file extend.css.file - it is designed to be extended so other plugins can add CSS to the blank file.
abstract.p: It offers three extension-points for further CSS processing.
